lead_paragraph: The Cincinnati Bengals have agreed to extend coach Marvin Lewis' contract until the end of the 2017 season, NFL.com reported on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Bengals Coach Lewis Given Contract Extension: Report
headline.main: Bengals Coach Lewis Given Contract Extension: Report
